items.sentence: I plan on going to Boston whether Tom wants to go with me or not.
Tom told me that he thought Mary didn't know how to speak French.
Mary assumed the bunch of flowers left on her desk were from Tom.
Tom was on his way to the hospital when his car ran off the road.
I think we'll need to call off the picnic because of the weather.
Tom soon found out that Mary was stealing from the cash register.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice have been friends since they were kids.
Tom was one of the men the police arrested yesterday in the park.
Mary knew Tom was a married man, but she flirted with him anyway.
Tom and Mary broke up not long after we visited them last summer.
